name: Sun Wukong
description:
Ha! So they think they can keep the great Sun Wukong in this puny mountain prison? Please. Oh, what? They also took your powers and scattered them throughout the mountain? Well, then. Better get to it!

Play as Sun Wukong, the Monkey King in this Metroidvania style game where you can explore, gain 7 different abilities, and go bananas! (Heh.) Use skills such as ground pounds and combo attacks to escape the mountain!

Controls

Move - WASD
Attack - K
Jump - L
Suicide - T

By Josh Maggard (@MaggardJosh) - Programming/SFX/Design
Dan Konves (@DankOvens) - Programming/Level Design
Denver Poteet (@DenverSkyline) - Art/Design

for Ludum Dare 32
